author: lgo
msg: Follow up r25960: don't wrap the target filename in single quotes, on Windows
these are accepted characters for filenames.
* subversion/svn/util.c
(svn_cl__edit_file_externally): drop the single quotes when passing the
filename of our tempfile to the external editor.

author: fabien
msg: Completion updated for '--accept' option.
Option activated for 5 commands: co merge resolved sw up
The option expected values differ for 'resolved'.
* tools/client-side/bash_completion: '--accept' option handling.

author: lgo
msg: Follow up r26957: avoid opening the text-base file for writing unless we're
actually going to write to it. In update_tests.py 37 we're copying the
text-base from another file, which - because of the already opened target
file - will fail on Windows with an 'Access Denied' error.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c
(add_file_with_history): only open textbase_file for writing when we will
fetch it from the repository, not if we're copying from another text-base.

author: fabien
msg: French translation update for r26982.
* subversion/po/fr.po: po-update, 25 fuzzy and 4 untranslated fixed.

author: fabien
msg: minor typo in localized error message fixed.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c: missing space in message.
